title: Bug 32770 - Java Application Launch Error Message Improvement
description: This bug report is related to the error message displayed when attempting to launch a Java application. The error message 'Launch failed: no main type found' is considered unhelpful and should be improved to provide more clarity and guidance to the user.
OB: The observed behavior is that a dialog appears with the unhelpful error message 'Launch failed: no main type found.'
EB: The expected behavior is to provide a more informative and user-friendly error message that guides the user on how to resolve the issue or identify the problem.
SR:
To reproduce the issue and view the unhelpful error message:
1. Open a Java file containing a main method.
2. Select a non-resource-based view, such as the Debug view.
3. Click 'Debug As' > 'Java Application'.
